column14:
'desc': [u'

RevAyur Hair Care Basics Dandruff Cleansing Shampoo (150 ml) Price: Rs.120

RevAyur Hair Care Basics Dandruff Cleansing Shampoo has the combination of Rosemary Extract & Neem Extract which effectively removes dandruff from scalp & prevents recurrence. This shampoo gives soothing benefit to itchy scalp whereas Aloevera Juice & Coconut Oil provides extract moisture and nourishment to hair. It gently cleanses and improves manageability. This Anti-dandruff Shampoo is suitable for all types of scalps that are prone to dandruff. How to Use: Massage gently on wet hair and scalp to build lather. Leave for 1 - 2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.
